content: **about pattern ** the badger set consists of the badger scarf and badger wrist warmers both are worked in garter stitch which means you will only need to know the knit stitch for this pattern they are made-to-measure so with a bit of simple math they can be made to any required size this pattern does not call for a specific yarn or needle size so it s great for busting your leftover stash you can use multiple different yarns as long as they are mostly from the same yarn weight category choose a needle size that you find compatible with the yarn s of choice level of difficulty beginner **sizes ** made-to-measure **garment measurements ** measure your own garment size instructions in the pattern **suggested yarn ** any yarn s you like **suggested needles ** you will need a long circular needle with a 80 cm / 32 in or longer cable and a crochet hook in the same or similar size choose the needle size according to the chosen yarn s **gauge ** simple instructions in the pattern **techniques ** crochet cast-on standard bind-off garter stitch in flat k all sts i would love to see your creations on instagram share your version with **#badgerset #badgerwristwarmers #badgerscarf @milenapauliina** happy knitting
